entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
